title: 2024 Spring Schedule
text:
Location and time
14th Feb: The boardroom, EBS second floor 28th Feb: Kennedy boardroom, EBS ground floor 6th Mar: Kennedy boardroom, EBS ground floor 20th Mar: Kennedy boardroom, EBS ground floor 12pm to 1pm 3rd Apr: Kennedy boardroom, EBS ground floor 17th Apr: Kennedy boardroom, EBS ground floor 1st May: Kennedy boardroom, EBS ground floor 15th May: MBG20 6th June 14:00: MBG11 - Computer Laboratory (20) - SoSS
The sessions will happen every (other) Wednesday from 1pm to 2pm till 15th May.
